services.name: Calmbirth速 Childbirth Education Course
services.description: Australia's most highly acclaimed childbirth education program. A comprehensive 12-hour face-to-face antenatal program that includes psychological and emotional preparation for childbirth. Learn to reframe birth, work with your body, and move past negative emotions through fear release techniques and guided relaxation.

category.name: Childbirth Education
category.description: Comprehensive antenatal education programs for expectant parents

services.name: Calmbirth速 Refresher Course
services.description: A condensed refresher course for couples who have previously completed Calmbirth or other childbirth education programs. Perfect for subsequent pregnancies or to reinforce key concepts and techniques.

category.name: Antenatal Preparation
category.description: Psychological and emotional preparation for childbirth

services.name: Private Calmbirth速 Session
services.description: One-on-one or private group Calmbirth education session tailored to your specific needs, concerns, and birth preferences. Perfect for couples wanting personalized attention or those with scheduling constraints.

category.name: Childbirth Education
category.description: Comprehensive antenatal education programs for expectant parents

services.name: Birth Partner Support Workshop
services.description: Specialized workshop focusing on the birth partner's role in supporting during labor and birth. Learn practical techniques for providing emotional and physical support throughout the birthing process.

category.name: Antenatal Preparation
category.description: Psychological and emotional preparation for childbirth

services.name: Fear Release & Relaxation Session
services.description: Focused session on fear release techniques and guided relaxation for birth preparation. Ideal for those experiencing significant birth anxiety or wanting to deepen their relaxation practice.

category.name: Fear Release & Relaxation
category.description: Guided relaxation and fear release techniques for birth preparation

services.name: Hospital-Based Calmbirth速 Program
services.description: Calmbirth program delivered within partner hospitals and birthing centers. Integrated into antenatal care pathways and often available through hospital antenatal education programs.

category.name: Childbirth Education
category.description: Comprehensive antenatal education programs for expectant parents
